text: (makkave vasaya karana kafirvaruni!) oba soyana jayagrahanaya nam, ema jayagrahanaya oba idiriyata pæmina æta. (ehet eya obata nova. visvasavantayin vana apataya! apima obata erehiva jayagrahanaya at kara gattemu. ebævin napura kirimen) min pasuva ho oba æt vuvahot eya obatama hondaya. min pasuvat oba (napura kirimata) idiripat vuvahot, apit idiripat vannemu. obage samuhaya kopamana visala vuvada, (eya) obata kisima prayojanayak at kara denne næta. mandayat niyata vasayenma allah visvasavantayin samaga sitinneya
